subject: Terminal input cannot insert newlines (no multiline compose)
description: Input filters out newline characters and Enter always submits, so users cannot compose multiline messages (except possible paste). This breaks multiline editing despite layout/line-count support. Add a shortcut to insert '\n' (e.g., Shift+Enter) and adjust interrupt keybinding accordingly, or add a dedicated multiline mode toggle. File: packages/terminal/src/components/Input.tsx:279-301.
